experiences: Experience our hassle-free transfer either to or from the Cairo Airport ,Enjoy the comfort of our private air-conditioned vehicle ,Relax and let us take care of your luggage for you
title: Cairo Airport: Private Transfer Service

description: Our representative will pick you up from your hotel in Sharm El Sheikh. You will then be transferred to Sharm El Sheikh Airport to catch your flight to Cairo. At Cairo Airport you will be met and assisted by another of our representatives. , ,Our Egyptologist guide will accompany you to visit the great pyramid of Giza, which is the only existing wonder of the seven wonders of the ancient world. At the Giza plateau, you will not only see the great pyramid of Khufu, known as Cheops, but also the pyramid of Chefren, the pyramid of Mykerinus, the valley temple of Khefren and the iconic Great Sphinx. This amazing complex of structures dates back to almost 5,000 years ago. , From there, you will be taken to the Egyptian museum, which houses around 150,000 artifacts that date thousands of years to ancient Egyptian civilization. This is considered the largest and most precious collection of Egyptian art in the world. Take your chance to admire the incredible treasures of the boy-king Tutankhamun. , ,After the museum, you will also have the chance to wander in the oldest bazaar in the middle east, the Khan El Khalili Bazaar, where you will feel the atmosphere of living in Islamic Cairo hundreds of years ago. The bazaar dates back to 1382, A.D., and is just one of the fascinating places we will see, giving you a real taste of the ancient city of Cairo. , ,At the end of the day you will be transferred to Cairo Airport for a flight back to Sharm El Sheikh.
includes: Pick-up and drop-off from your hotel in Sharm ,All transfers by a private air-conditioned vehicle ,Return flight ticket Sharm / Cairo / Sharm ,English-speaking Egyptologist guide during your trip ,Entrance fees to the mentioned sites in Cairo ,Lunch meal at local restaurant ,Cairo Shopping tours in Cairo ,All taxes and service charges
experiences: Take a full-day tour to Cairo from Sharm El Sheikh, including a return flight ,Visit some of Cairo's most amazing sights and attractions, including the Great Pyramids and the Egyptian Museum ,Enjoy a delicious lunch at a local restaurant in Cairo
title: Cairo Day Tour from Sharm El Sheikh by Air

description: Watch in awe as the bright illuminations reflect off the water and light up the sky and the splendor of ancient Thebes comes back to glorious life. , ,Experience the world-famous one-hour sound and light show at the Karnak Temple on the banks of the Nile River. This unique show tells the story of the temple and the history of Thebes, including the lives and celebrated achievements of the great pharaohs who built the necropolis. , ,Marvel at the sheer size of the great hypostyle hall and view the eerie reflection of the temple at the Sacred Lake as you wander around the illuminated monuments and towering obelisks. Enjoy the perfect setting for a dramatic finale to an exciting show.
includes: Transportation by air-conditioned van ,Entrance to the show ,Taxes and service fees
experiences: Experience the magic of the world-famous Karnak Temple sound and light show ,Marvel at the colorful lights in the sky along the Nile River ,Learn the fascinating story of the temple and the history of Thebes
title: Sound and Light Show at the Karnak Temple Complex

description: Explore the many treasures of the ancient world on this all-inclusive day tour to Luxor from Cairo, traveling by plane and bus. , ,After being collected from your hotel in Cairo at around 05:30, drive by air-conditioned vehicle to the airport, ready to fly to Luxor. Your expert guide will meet you at the airport and your tour will begin. , ,Make an excursion to the Necropolis of Thebes on the Western Bank. Crossing the Nile, visit the Valley of the Kings, and see the grand tombs of some of the most powerful nobles and pharos of Ancient Egypt. On the return journey stop-off at the Colossi of Memnon, 2 gigantic statues representing Amenophis III facing the Nile. You will also have the chance to visit the famous Temple of Queen Hatshepsut. , ,Explore the Luxor Temple and marvel at the granite statues of Ramses the Great in the courtyard. Proceed by carriage or bus to Karnak a series of temples spanning from different reigns and eras. , ,Walk through the Avenue of Sphinxes, visit the Hypostyle Hall with its 134 gigantic columns, see the Obelisks of Queen Hatshepsut and Tutomosis III, and witness the temple of Amon, adorned with exquisite lotus and papyrus designs. , ,After a whirlwind exploration into the treasures of the ancient world, transfer back to the airport for your return flight to Cairo, and to your hotel.
includes: Return flight tickets from Cairo to Luxor ,Entrance fees ,Expert guide ,Bottle of water ,All transfers by a private air-conditioned car ,Lunch ,Taxes
experiences: Explore the most important treasures of the ancient world in Luxor led by an expert guide ,Relax with return plane transfer from Cairo and air-conditioned transportation ,Dine in a local restaurant with all food (not drinks) inclusive in the price ,Experience the East Bank with the Luxor and Karnak temples ,Explore the West Bank and visit the Valley of the Kings and the Colossi of Memnon
title: All-Inclusive Guided Tour of Luxor from Cairo by Plane

description: You will be picked up by air-conditioned vehicle at your hotel in Marsa Alam early in the morning and welcomed by your tour guide in Cairo. Your guide will accompany you throughout your tour of Cairo and tell you all about the history of Egypt. , ,The first destination on the day trip to Cairo is the Egyptian Museum. There you can explore the ancient treasures of the pharaoh Tutankhamun. After visiting the museum you will have time to rest a little and enjoy lunch at a selected restaurant. , ,After lunch you will visit the oldest surviving Wonders of the World   the Great Pyramid of Giza   as well as the Pyramid of Khafre and the Pyramid of Menkaure. Enjoy the fantastic view of all the pyramids of former kings and queens. You can then admire the famous guardian of the pyramids   the Great Sphinx. , ,At the end of the tour you will fly back to the airport in Hurghada and then driven back to your hotel in Marsa Alam.
includes: Hotel transfers ,Tour guide Flight tickets ,Lunch ,Entrance fees to all the attractions mentioned in the itinerary
experiences: Immerse yourself in the impressive world of the pharaohs and explore the fascinating Pyramids of Giza ,Discover the treasures of former kings and queens in the Egyptian Museum ,Learn more about the history of Egypt ,Admire the famous Sphinx, the guardian at the foot of the pyramids
title: From Marsa Alam: Full-Day Tour of Cairo with Flights

description: See the wonders of Egypt on this tour. First you will visit the Pyramids of Cheops, Chephren and Mykerinus. Then make a stop at the Great Sphinx, which has the head of a pharaoh with a lion's body. The Sphinx dates to the time of Chephren. This tour also includes a visit to the Valley Temple, which belongs to the Pyramid of Chephren. , ,Continue sightseeing with an exciting tour to the Step Pyramids of Zoser, the world's oldest major stone structure. It was built in the 3rd Dynasty (around 2630 BC) for King Djoser. , ,Transfer to Memphis, which was founded by King Menes, and was the capital of Old Egypt during the Old Kingdom. It was considered to be a center of rule and culture for over 3000 years. The Statue of Ramses II is a highlight of this stop.
includes: All transfers by a modern air-conditioned vehicle ,Transfer by a private air-conditioned vehicle ,Guide of your own language ,All taxes & service charge
experiences: Make a full-day tour to the pyramids, one of the 7 wonders of the world ,Spend a day in Cairo with an Egyptologist guide
title: Cairo, Giza Pyramids, Memphis & Sakkara Day Tour

description: Following pick-up from your hotel or assigned meeting point in Hurghada, journey to the outskirts of the Red Sea resort, passing local villages en route to an off-road base in the desert wilderness. , ,Upon arrival, get a briefing on how to operate the dune buggy before embarking on a self-drive adventure across the desert sands. Follow the guides in convoy, traveling through pristine sand dunes for a roller-coaster ride with stops to take stunning souvenir photos. , ,Watch a beautiful sunset as it melts across the horizon in a rainbow of colors, and then join an evening barbecue dinner before heading back to Hurghada, where you will be dropped off at your hotel.
includes: Private guide ,Adventure safari by Polaris RZR dune buggy ,Water and soft drinks in the van ,Camel ride ,Desert transfers
experiences: Cross the desert dunes outside Hurghada by dune buggy ,Watch the sunset over the desert dunes ,Enjoy a barbecue dinner under a canopy of stars
title: Hurghada: Sunset Desert Safari by Dune Buggy

description: Benefit from pick-up at your hotel in Aswan, and then journey across the desert by private, air-conditioned vehicle in the cooler temperature of the morning. , ,Make your way to Abu Simbel to see the Great Temple of Ramses II and the temple of Queen Nefertari, both discovered in 1813 when they were almost completely covered with sand. Learn how they were moved in 1960 with the help of the government of Egypt and UNESCO to avoid the rising waters of the River Nile. , ,See the mural depicting the famous victory by Ramses II at the Battle of Qadesh and admire the Small Temple that he built for his favorite wife, Queen Nefertari. Marvel at the rock-cut sanctuary and its amazing bas reliefs before returning to Aswan to get dropped off at your hotel.
includes: Hotel pick-up and drop off ,English-speaking Egyptologist guide ,Entrance fees ,All service charges and taxes
experiences: See the magnificent temples of Abu Simbel ,Marvel at the rock-cut Small Temple of Queen Nefertari ,Travel across the desert in the cool early morning
title: From Aswan: Private Tour to Abu Simbel

description: Take a tour of this fantastic paradise island starting at around 08:00 AM with pick-up from your accommodation. Transfer to the marina and enjoy access to all equipment you may need, such as masks and fins for snorkeling later.   , ,After roughly 45 minutes of sailing in a beautiful area, stop to enjoy around 1 hour of snorkeling near the coral reef where you can explore the varied marine life. , ,Then, it's time to set sail for Paradise Beach on Giftun Island (transfer by shuttle boats to the island), where you will have the rest of the day to explore and relax. The guide will inform you of the place to have lunch, a simple but delicious open buffet with one soft drink. The rest of the day you can enjoy before heading back around 04:30 PM.
includes: Hotel transfer ,Snorkeling guide ,Lunch on the island ,Snorkeling equipment
experiences: Enjoy a full day on the island ,Stop for a 1-hour snorkeling adventure ,Savor lunch on the island

description: Enjoy a 3-hour city tour with a personal guide through the sights of Hurghada. Admire the Great Mosque with its two tall minarets, the church of Santa Maria, and the harbor. Enjoy the typical Middle Eastern flair and the colorful crowds in a characteristic bazaar. , ,After pick-up from your hotel, take a discovery tour through the inner city of Hurghada before enjoying the chance to meet a local fisherman at the harbor.  , ,Take an breathtaking look at the Red Sea and wander through different parts of the city before returning to your hotel in Hurghada.
includes: Transfers in air-conditioned vehicle ,German-speaking tour guide ,Juice and cake in a garden restaurant ,1 bottle of water during the tour ,All taxes and additional fees
experiences: Discover the highlights of Hurghada on a private 3-hour tour in an air-conditioned vehicle ,Enjoy the colorful crowds and the aroma of the Middle East with a wander through a traditional Egyptian bazaar ,See the largest mosque in Hurghada and get to know a local fisherman at the harbor

description: Visit the impressive capital of Egypt with all its fascinating sights and enjoy the beautiful route along the coast of the Gulf of Suez and through the imposing Sinai Desert. , ,Visit the Egyptian Museum and admire the collection of more than 120,000 pieces of art. Take a look at the fascinating artifacts from the Old, Middle and New Kingdoms of Egypt as well as the exhibition of King Tutankhamen. , ,Then visit the pyramids of Giza   one of the seven wonders of the ancient world and the only one largely intact. Admire the imposing pyramids of Cheops, Chephren and Mykerinos. Explore the Giza Plateau and admire the beautiful scenery. , ,Then explore the Valley of the Kings and admire the impressive Sphinx. Visit the surrounding temples and enjoy lunch at one of the local restaurants. Stroll through the markets of Cairo and see the local produce, before returning to your hotel at the end of the day.
includes: Bus trip from Sharm el Sheikh to Cairo and back ,Pyramids of Giza and the Sphinx visit ,Egyptian National Museum visit ,Tour guide ,Lunch ,All entrance fees to the sights
experiences: Embark on a journey through time into the history of Egypt's ancient pharaohs and visit the main sights of Cairo ,Drive through the Sinai Desert and visit the fascinating Egyptian National Museum with over 120,000 artefacts ,Admire the Pyramids of Giza, take a look at the impressive Sphinx and stroll around the exotic markets
title: Cairo: Day Tour from Sharm el Sheikh

description: At 07:00 on day one, your tour guide and driver will pick you up from your hotel in Cairo and take you to Bahariya Oasis, about 350 km east. This journey takes about 4 hours: lunch will be served at a local restaurant at Bahariya oasis. From here, you will continue on to the Black Desert, and the natural hot springs in the Valley of El Haize, before driving to the quartz crystals at Crystal Mountain, and the rocky formations in the Valley of Agabat. ,  ,Later on day one, explore the White Desert National Park, the most well-known desert destination in Egypt. The quantity of unearthly and beautiful wind-carved rock formations shaped in the form of giant mushrooms or pebbles is unequalled by any desert in the world. Arrive at the White Desert by sunset, and our Bedouin staff will arrange dinner and desert camping. , ,On day 2, you'll enjoy breakfast in the desert, before driving to Bahariya Oasis to get some rest and take a shower. Then drive back to Cairo.
includes: Pick-up and drop off services from/to your hotel ,Travel by private air-conditioned vehicle ,Tours by private Jeep 4X4 to the White and Black Deserts ,Desert camping for one night ,English-speaking driver ,All camping equipment and tents ,All meals (breakfast, lunch and dinner) ,Beverages including mineral water and tea ,All taxes and service charges
experiences: Enjoy the drive into Egypt's western desert ,Visit the crystal mountain ,Discover the valley of the Golden Mummies ,Explore the Famous White Desert and Black Desert
title: Cairo: 2-Day Bahariya Oasis Camp with White & Black Deserts

description: Experience the Hurghada desert and Bedouin life on this 4WD Land Cruiser Sahara Park Safari. You ll be picked up at your hotel and drive through the desert, kicking up the sand on the Hurghada highway. , ,Along the way your driver will stop a couple of times for you to marvel at the mirages and to climb up a massive sand dune. When you arrive at the Bedouin village you ll enjoy a welcome drink with a tasty boxed lunch. , ,On this 6-hour adventure, you ll have time to tour the village and learn more about the traditional Bedouin way of life. Afterwards, you ll climb on board a camel for a thrilling desert ride! , ,Enjoy the sunset from a mountaintop, taking in the spectacular views before you enjoy an open buffet dinner with soft drinks. , ,Thrill to the Sahara Park show, which begins with a tanura dance, followed by belly dancing, and folk songs. , ,Experience the stunning desert sky at night, watching the stars and planets through a powerful digital telescope. , ,At the end of the day you ll be driven back to your hotel.
includes: 4WD Land Cruiser safari ,Water and soft drinks during the trip ,Bedouin dinner ,Camel ride ,Star gazing by telescope ,Entrance fees to places mentioned in the description
experiences: Stop to view mirages during a 4WD drive through the desert ,Visit a Bedouin village and take a ride on a camel ,Enjoy a traditional meal and see the Sahara Park show with traditional dancing ,See the stars in the desert sky through a powerful digital telescope
title: Hurghada: 6-Hour 4WD Desert Safari, Dinner, and Show

description: Benefit from pick-up at your hotel in Cairo or Giza, and then travel to the Giza Plateau to explore the pyramids of Ancient Egypt with an Egyptologist guide. Hear the amazing story about how the pyramids were built, and for what purpose, and get panoramic views of all the pyramids and Great Sphinx from a high vantage point. , ,Then travel to the step pyramid of Sakkara, built in the 27th century BC as a burial site for the pharaoh Djoser. Learn about the evolution of pyramid construction at one of the oldest and most important temple sites of Ancient Egypt. , ,Continue on to explore the Open Air Museum at Memphis and see the biggest statue in the world of Ramses the second. ,Later you will be transferred back to your hotel.
includes: Pick-up and drop off at hotels in Cairo or Giza ,Transportation by air-conditioned private car ,Qualified Egyptology guide (in your chosen language) ,Bottle of water per person ,All services and taxes
experiences: See the monumental Great Sphinx in the Giza Plateau ,Explore the burial sites of Egyptian pharaohs at the Pyramids of Giza ,Wander through the Valley Temple ,Visit the first step pyramid in history, built for the 27th century BC pharaoh Djoser
title: Giza Pyramids, Sakkara and Memphis Museum Guided Tour

description: Have you ever been on a discovery tour in the desert? Then, try a horse or a camel riding experience at the Giza Pyramids during sunrise or sunset. , ,While experiencing the camel or horse ride, enjoy the fascinating view of the Great Pyramids of Cheops, Chephren and Mykerinus and the Sphinx from the outside. The Great Pyramids and the Sphinx are considered the oldest of the seven wonders of the ancient world, tallest man-made structure in the world for over 3,800 years and the most important tourist site in Egypt.   , ,Have dinner or lunch after your ride camel in a good restaurant offering Egyptian food such as oriental soup, fish grilled or fried, shish kebab, chicken, five kinds of salad, one appetizer, rice, bread and dessert including a welcome drink karkadi. Then, head back to your hotel in the center of Cairo or Giza. This is a private tour, you will not be added to another group. All tours are accompanied by an expert tour guide and a groom to ensure that you will have a pleasant time in the desert including water and soft drinks.
includes: Return pick-up services from your hotel ,All transfers by an air-conditioned vehicle ,Qualified expert guide ,Entrance to visit all the area of Pyramids ,Entrance to visit the Sphinx and temple ,A horse or camel ride for 2-hours Free shopping in the area of pyramids ,Lunch in the number one restaurant in Giza ,Welcome drink karkadeh ,One small mineral water during your tour ,All taxes and service charges
experiences: Go on a camel or horse ride at the Giza Pyramids ,See the Giza Pyramids from a unique perspective ,Take a romantic, relaxing and unique tour ,Visit the Valley of the Sphinx
title: Cairo: Camel or Horse Ride By the Pyramids

description: Begin this half-day tour of the Pyramids of Giza and the Sphinx straight from your hotel in Cairo. Head toward the Pyramids of Cheops, Chephren, and Mykerinus and discover the oldest of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World, and the only one to remain largely intact. Egyptologists believe the Pyramid of Cheops (also known as the Great Pyramid of Giza) was built as a tomb for the Egyptian Pharaoh Khofo and constructed over a 14 to 20-year period in 2560 BC. , ,Afterwards, continue on toward the Great Sphinx. The Sphinx has the head of a pharaoh with a lion's body and dates back to the time of Chephren. This sphinx was made to guard the pyramids of King Chefren. Next, visit the Valley Temple which belonged to the Pyramids of Chephren. The temple acted as a place for the purification and mummification process of the king before burial.
includes: All transportation by modern, air-conditioned vehicle ,All entrance fees ,English-speaking Egyptologist ,Bottled mineral water ,All service charges and taxes
experiences: Discover the Great Pyramid of Giza and the legendary Valley Temple ,Explore the ancient Pyramid of Khufu and the Pyramid of Cheops ,Gaze in awe at the Great Sphinx
title: Half-Day Cairo Sightseeing Tour to Pyramids of Giza & Sphinx

description: Experience a fascinating snorkeling adventure in the Red Sea. After the pick-up at your hotel you will head to the beautiful peninsula of Soma Bay, which will be your first snorkeling stop. Here there is also a pier, from which you will start the boat tour. Around Utopia Island are several natural reefs where you can enjoy snorkeling. Explore the unique underwater world and admire the countless colorful fish and beautiful corals. , ,After a few snorkeling stops you can relax with a delicious lunch onboard the boat and recharge your batteries. Afterwards you will transfer to a glass-bottomed boat and spend a memorable few hours admiring the underwater world of the Red Sea below your feet. For two hours you will have a direct view into the crystal-clear waters surrounding Utopia Island.
includes: Transfers from/to your hotel by air-conditioned vehicle ,Snorkeling equipment ,Lunch onboard the boat ,Drinks ,Life jackets ,Toilets ,Snorkeling guide ,Covered areas onboard the boat
experiences: Explore the fascinating and diverse underwater world of the Red Sea at various snorkeling sites ,Admire the natural reefs, beautiful corals, and colorful fish surrounding Utopia Island ,Enjoy a relaxing ride onboard a glass-bottomed boat
title: Full-Day Snorkeling Trip to Utopia Island from Hurghada

description: Your guide will meet you at 8:00 AM in your hotel lobby and will pick you up in an air-conditioned car to start your full-day tour. You will visit the Great Pyramids and have a close-up look at the Sphinx. You will have an extra half-hour in the desert between the three pyramids to have a look around the remains of this ancient civilization. , ,Then, continue your tour to visit the Coptic area of Cairo, where you can see the church of Abu-Sergah and St. Barbara, the hanging church and the old Jewish synagogue, Ben Ezra. , ,Your guide will then take you to Moqatem to visit Simon the Tanner, a famous church in Cairo, named for the Coptic Orthodox saint. After you finish your visit to Simon Cave, you will enjoy lunch at a local restaurant to taste Egyptian food. The tour ends here and you will then be transferred back to your hotel.
includes: Hotel pick-up and drop off ,Air-conditioned private vehicle ,Entrance fees ,Multilingual Egyptology tour guide ,Bottle of water - soft drink (one per person) ,Lunch at local restaurant (drinks excluding) ,All taxes and services
experiences: Spend 8 hours visiting the Giza Pyramids, the Sphinx, Simon Church and the Hanging Church ,Explore the land of the Pharaohs and the Holy Land ,Enjoying tasting Egyptian food ,Explore the cave of Saint Simon from inside the Mountain of Maqatam
title: From Cairo: Full-Day Tour of Giza Pyramids & Simon Cave

description: Spend a day out on the water learning to scuba dive on an 8-hour experience. This trip is suited for beginners and experts alike who simply want to enjoy the waters of the Red Sea. , ,After pick-up, you will be taken out on a boat to your first diving spot. Experienced instructors will guide you around the location and explain the specifics of the diving site. Then head into the sea and explore the underwater realm. , ,Once your first dive ends, enjoy an on-board lunch. Then you will move to a new site for the second dive. Opt to snorkel or swim if you feel like it. You will also have plenty of time to relax and sample the provided refreshments. In the late afternoon, you will be returned to shore.
includes: Round-trip transfer in air-conditioned vehicle ,Tank and weights ,Instructor fees ,Lunch, mineral water, and soft drinks
experiences: Learn the basics of scuba diving from a certified instructor ,Take in the beautiful views of the water and land as you cruise along the Red Sea ,Go scuba diving at 2 different dives sites ,Enjoy swimming and snorkeling in the water ,Relax and eat an onboard lunch with drinks
title: Full-Day Scuba Diving Tour with Lunch & Pick-Up

description: From your hotel you will be driven to Hurghada Marina, sailing for approximately one and a quarter hours towards Hurghada islands, Enjoy panoramic views of the islands and then two stops for swimming or snorkeling. , ,Lunch is served with an open buffet after the second stop. Relax and enjoy the sunshine. The duration of the trip is approximately 6 hours. Lunch and all drinks throughout the trip are included. Snorkeling equipment and life jackets are also included. , ,This luxury boat is the only one of its kind in Hurghada and is equipped with all kinds of rest and safety equipment in accordance with international standards. Sail for an hour to discover coral reef with two comprehensive snorkelling stops before returning to the Marina.
includes: Transfers from your hotel round trip. ,Comprehensive equipment for each person ,A certified Snorkel instructor for each facility. ,Hot and cold drinks during the whole day ,Lunch open buffet consists of (soup fish and 3 types of salad appetizer and sweet and rice and potatoes and two types of fish and two types of grills (Chicks Kufta) and fruit season. Free Wi-Fi ,Zodiac rescue facilities for guests
experiences: Enjoy a day of premier snorkelling ,Sail aboard the largest boat in the Red Sea ,Admire coral reefs ,Eat lunch and on board
title: From Hurghada: Pirates Premier Sailing Boat Trip

description: Pick-up from your hotel in Sharm El Sheikh will be around 8:15 AM.On arrival at the marina, you are off to Tiran island for the day to receive your introduction to diving. The experienced diver will talk through with you all the basics of the dive and introduce you to the aqualung. Once you have this mastered, the rest is easy. They will go through the safety precautions that are taken and ensure that you fully understand the sign language that is used underwater. After being kitted up with the jacket, tank, weights and mask, its time to enter the water. When you are ready they will take you down below the surface at a steady pace and they will be with you at all times. , ,The rest of the day is spent taking a second dive if you have booked one or swimming or snorkeling at either of the other two stops the boat will make. The transfer vehicle will be waiting for you when you return to the port in the late afternoon and they will transfer you back directly to your hotel.
includes: Buffet lunch ,Light refreshments ,Professional licensed diver/guide ,Hotel pick-up and drop off ,Transport by air-conditioned minivan ,All snorkeling equipment
experiences: Sail along the Red Sea to your first dive spot, where you'll see bright marine life ,Receive diving instruction and carry out a safely dive with your guide ,See native wildlife in their natural environment
title: From Sharm: Introduction to Scuba Diving with Lunch

description: Arriving at a new destination can be a stressful experience. But with this private transfer from Sharm El Sheikh Airport to Sharm El Sheikh hotels, you can take the worry out of finding a taxi and skip the long lines with a guaranteed meet and greet. , ,An Egypt Excursions representative will pick you up outside the exit door of Sharm El Sheikh Airport and assist you with your luggage. They will be holding a sign with your name written on it, ready to transport you by private air-conditioned vehicle to your hotel. , ,The vehicles can take up to 4 passengers, and wheelchair accesible vehicles are available on request, for a small extra charge. Simply provide your flight details and hotel name on booking, and Egypt Excursions will make the arrangements. For transfers to Sharm El Sheikh Airport at the end of your trip, a transfer time of 2 hours before your flight time will be necessary.
includes: 1-way transfer by private air-conditioned vehicle ,English-speaking representative at Sharm El Sheikh Airport ,Luggage handling
experiences: Enjoy Sharm El Sheikh's scenery without having to worry about traffic or maps ,Relax, knowing your driver will track your flight and allow for delays and early arrivals to Sharm El Sheikh Airport ,Enjoy the privacy and comfort of a private ride through the Red Sea region ,Avoid Sharm El Sheikh Airport's long lines for cabs with your priority reservation
title: Private Sharm El Sheikh Airport Transfers

description: Watch the sunrise and see the amazing scenery of the Sinai Desert on an overnight tour to Mount Sinai, where Moses received the 10 Commandments. , ,Travel by private, air-conditioned van and retrace the footsteps of Moses to the summit of the mountain in time to see the sun rise over the desert as it was thousands of years ago. Make your way down at around 7:00 AM and stop at St. Catherine's Monastery to explore one of the oldest monasteries in the world. , ,Learn more about Saint Catherine, who was tortured to death for the sake of her religious beliefs, and see the chapel of the church where the Mosaic of Transfiguration is held.
includes: Hotel pick-up and drop off ,Transportation by air-conditioned van ,Breakfast at a restaurant in Saint Catherine ,Professional Bedouin guide at Mount Sinai ,Tour of Saint Catherine's Monastery ,All services and taxes
experiences: Climb Mount Sinai to watch the sun rise over the Sinai Desert ,Explore St. Catherine's Monastery ,See where Moses received the 10 Commandments
title: From Sharm el-Sheikh: Mount Sinai Sunrise Climb

description: Enjoy a fantastic orientation tour of Cairo on an 8-hour excursion that takes in the major monuments of Old Cairo and the maze of streets and stalls of the historic Khan El Khalili Bazaar. , Following a hotel pick-up from Cairo or Giza, you will drive up to the Saladin Citadel, constructed by Salah al-Din on the Moqattam Hills in 1183 AD as a defence against Crusader armies. Known for its fresh air and sweeping views of Cairo, it is now a preserved historic site of mosques and museums, including the Mosque of Muhammad Ali Pasha. , ,Designed by the Turkish architect Yousif Boushnaq, who came to Cairo especially from Istanbul to build the great building, the mosque's alabaster structure stands in beautiful contrast to the sandstone city. Continue to the Khan el-Khalili Bazaar, one of the oldest bazaars in the Middle East. Discover a maze of alleys that has been at the center of Cairo s trading activities since the 14th century. , ,Then, visit Old Cairo to see major attractions such as the Hanging Church, the Ben Ezra Synagogue, the Church of St. Barbara, and the Church of Abu Serga, one of the oldest Coptic churches in Cairo.
includes: Egyptologist guide ,Lunch ,Transportation ,Entrance fees ,Parking fees ,Taxes and service charge
experiences: Immerse yourself in Egyptian history with a sightseeing tour of Old Cairo's major sights ,Visit the Cairo Citadel on the Moqattam Hills for grand views over the city ,See the beautiful alabaster Mosque of Muhammad Ali, built for Muhammad Ali Pasha between 1830 and 1848 ,Discover the sights of Old Cairo, such as the Hanging Church and the Ben Ezra Synagogue ,Wander the alleys of the Khan el-Khalili Bazaar and try out your bargaining skills
title: Cairo Citadel, Old Cairo & Khan El Khalili Full-Day Tour

description: Discover the breathtaking underwater world of the Red Sea from an incredible new perspective. After a pick-up from your hotel, go directly to the submarine and immerse yourself in the Red Sea. This modern submarine features over 18 panoramic windows, which offer unique views of the coral reefs and a fascinating variety of exotic and colorful fish. , ,Sit back and relax in your seat as you venture to the depths of the sea. Discover the breathtaking varieties of coral and fish of all shapes and sizes.
includes: Transfer to and from your hotel in an air-conditioned vehicle ,Mineral water onboard during the tour
experiences: Immerse yourself in Nemo's world and let the beauty of the world under the Red Sea enchant you ,Enjoy an incredible look at the colorful fish and impressive coral from your submarine ,Relax as you explore the depths of the sea
title: Sharm el-Sheikh: Panoramic Submarine Adventure

description: Fun and thrills await you at the largest water theme park on the Red Sea coast. Enjoy the water games, huge swimming pools, wave pools, rafting, and more with a full-day admission ticket. , ,A tour company representative will pick you up at your hotel at the agreed time and drive you to Jungle Aqua Park, where you re sure to enjoy the wide range of water sports and social activities with your family and friends. , ,The Jungle Aqua Park features 35 water slides, 14 outdoor swimming pools, a heated pool, water lakes, poolside umbrellas, and sun beds. Hurghada s largest water theme park is located just 25 minutes by car from the downtown area. , ,At the end of your day of fun you ll be transferred back to your hotel.
includes: Round-trip hotel transfers ,Transportation by air-conditioned vehicle ,Park admission ,Lunch ,Soft drinks ,All taxes and service charges
experiences: Choose from among the 35 water slides at Jungle Aqua Park ,Swim in one or more of the 14 outdoor pools at Hurghada s largest water theme park ,Relax by a pool or use one of the sun beds

description: Discover the underwater world of Egypt on this full-day snorkeling trip from Hurghada. You will be picked-up at your hotel early in the morning and driven to Safaga. Here you will meet your guide, who will accompany you throughout the day. , ,After a brief introduction and overview of the day s program, the boat will anchor at the first snorkeling site. Your snorkeling guide will select the best places for snorkeling depending on the weather, allowing you to experience as much of the colorful underwater world of the Red Sea as possible. , ,Cruise to the location on the program, where you can once again observe numerous exotic and colorful fish, plants, corals, and other marine life. Enjoy a delicious lunch onboard the boat before cruising to Utopia Island on a glass-bottomed boat. You will have a fantastic view into the sea through the transparent bottom of the boat. You will then have enough time on the island for swimming in the sea or relaxing in the sunshine.
includes: Ride on a glass-bottomed boat to Utopia Island and back ,Tour guide/snorkeling guide ,Boat trip ,Snorkeling ,Lunch with 1 drink onboard the boat ,Snorkeling equipment ,Service charges and taxes
experiences: Enjoy a wonderful day in Safaga and Utopia Island ,Snorkel among colorful fish and corals ,Explore the exotic underwater world at two different snorkeling sites ,Enjoy a delicious lunch with soft drinks onboard the boat ,Experience a ride onboard a glass-bottomed boat ,Discover the exotic and colorful flora and fauna of the Red Sea ,See corals, plants, fish, and other marine animals
title: Full-Day Snorkeling Tour to Utopia Island with Pick-Up

description: The crystal clear waters stretch out in front of you as you sail towards one of the most beautiful sites for snorkeling anywhere in the world. An easy drive and sail from Sharm el Sheikh, your day of snorkeling will be filled with colorful creatures and over 130 sorts of coral and 1,000s of brightly colored fish in Egypt's only National Park. , ,Departing your hotel in Sharm el Sheikh at 8:00, you will take a quick drive to the dock before sailing off into the paradise. There are two or three stops for snorkeling along the way, depending on conditions. You will stop in the Red Sea, Gulf of Aqba, and the Gulf of Suez. There's gear to hire on board, or bring your own and enjoy your day out at sea! , ,Arrive back at your hotel around 17:00.
includes: All transfers by air-conditioned vehicle ,Entrance fees to Ras Mohamed Park ,Cruise yacht ticket and fees ,Lunch ,Snorkeling guide aboard cruise ,1 bottled water & soft drink free
experiences: Sail into the beauty of Egypt's only National Park ,Dive into the refreshing waters for a look at the underwater world ,Make 3 stops along the way ,Relax on board with free water and soft drinks
title: Snorkeling Adventure: Ras Mohammed National Park by Boat

description: You will be picked up from your hotel in Marsa Alam and driven to Luxor in an air-conditioned vehicle. Here you will visit the famous Temple of Karnak, the largest religious building ever constructed. The ancient Egyptian name for the place is Ipet-isut, meaning the holiest of all places. , ,After this, you will enjoy a wonderful lunch at a restaurant. Then you will head to the western bank of the Nile, where the colossal statue of Amenhotep III, the colossus of Memnon, awaits. Continue on to the Valley of the Kings, to see the breathtaking graves of the Pharaohs. , ,You will visit 3 tombs and then continue on to the Mortuary Temple of Hatshepsut in El Deir El Bahary. This imposing temple, dedicated to Queen Hatshepsut, the only female Pharaoh, rises in a series of terraces from the desert plain, perched on sandstone cliffs. At the end of your tour, you will be returned to your hotel in Marsa Alam.
includes: Day trip to Luxor ,Transportation in an air-conditioned vehicle ,Hotel pick-up and drop off ,Tour guide ,Entrance fees to all the attractions mentioned in the itinerary ,Lunch at a quality local restaurant ,Soft drinks in the vehicle ,Service charges and taxes
experiences: Experience the Temple of Karnak, the largest temple ever constructed ,Have a delicious lunch at a restaurant ,See the two statues of Amenhotep III ,Visit the royal tombs in the Valley of the Kings ,Discover the life of a female Pharaoh at Hatshepsut temple
title: From Marsa Alam: Day Trip to Luxor by Bus

description: Experience a stress-free arrival at Hurghada International Airport and treat yourself to a little luxury after a long, tiring flight. With this transfer service you will be picked up at the airport and driven in a private limousine or van to your hotel in El Gouna. , ,Enjoy a relaxing start to your vacation with this pre-arranged transfer service. Your friendly driver will meet you at the airport and will be holding a sign with your name written on it. You will then enjoy a relaxing drive to your hotel in El Gouna in an air-conditioned vehicle with room for up to 8 people. Simply sit back, relax, and enjoy the view along the way.
includes: Transport by air-conditioned limousine or van ,Transfer from Hurghada International Airport to El Gouna (one-way)
experiences: Experience pure luxury with this relaxing transfer from Hurghada International Airport to your hotel in El Gouna ,Sit back, relax, and enjoy your first impressions of Egypt along the way ,Enjoy a stress-free arrival in Egypt with a pre-arranged airport transfer ,Save yourself the hassle of searching for a taxi at the airport
title: One-Way Airport Transfer from Hurghada to El Gouna

description: To enjoy the real taste of Egypt you have to try the best Egyptian food - one of life s great pleasures, Discover off-the-beaten-path spots and the real Egypt that is not covered in any guidebook. , ,This food tour offers an unforgettable and amazing experiences in one of the oldest cultures and cuisines in the Mediterranean. Find the best places to eat in Egypt and enjoy many delicious food tastings. ,Become an Egyptian food expert and learn how to spot the fake stuff from the real thing! ,
includes: All transfers by air-conditioned vehicle ,Expert tour guide ,All Service charges & taxes
experiences: Enjoy a food tour of Cairo ,Visit traditional restaurants ,Taste the best food in Egypt

description: Your tour guide will be waiting at your hotel for you. They will be holding a sign of your name. From the moment your tour starts, your guide will give you their full attention. Once in the car, your guide will talk to you about all the things on the way as well as other aspects of your tour that will interest you. , ,Enjoy the only place in Egypt where you can experience the wonders of the ancient world through the quad bike tour Desert Safari by Quad Bike Around Pyramids experience with a panoramic view of the Pyramids of Cheops, Chephren and Mykerinus. , ,What is unique about this tour is getting there is half the fun, Be near the great pyramids of Giza and the Sphinx enjoying the adventure of quad bikes. Afterwards travel in comfort back to your hotel.
includes: Pick-up services from your hotel in Cairo and return ,All transfers by air-conditioned vehicle ,Riding of quad bikes ,Expert tour guide ,Bottled water during your trip ,All service charges and taxes
experiences: Enjoy a desert safari ,Ride a quad bike ,Travel around the Pyramids
title: Desert Safari by Quad Bike Around Pyramids

description: Your guide will pick you up ftom your hotel in Cairo or Giza to visit everything special in Cairo. First, go to the Sultan Hassan Mosque, which is one of the largest and most important medieval mosques in Cairo. , ,Next, you drive to Old Cairo. In old Cairo, you will be able to visit the Babylon fortress and the St. Sergios Church with its crypt, where the holy family took refuge. You will also visit the hanging church, rich in antiquities from the early Christian period, as well as St. Barbara Church, where the relics of Saint John are kept. , ,Saving the best for last, your tour will end with a 3-hour Nile cruise with dinner. An evening cruise on one of the Nile boats is a wonderful opportunity to spend and look at Cairo's skyline at night. During the evening, you will find everything your heart desires at an open buffet. In addition, on this Nile cruise in Cairo you will watch a belly dance show, Arabic songs and music, along with a Tanoura show while delighting in your delicious meal. Spend an evening in the open air, enjoy the good food, the unique entertainment and the magnificent views of the banks of the Nile.
includes: All transfers with a modern and air conditioned vehicle ,Egyptologist leader ,A bottle of water ,Tour on the Nile ,International buffet dinner ,All taxes and services
experiences: Visit Sultan Hassan Mosque ,Marvel at Old Cairo ,Enjoy sailing on the River Nile aboard a traditional felucca wooden sailing boat ,Watch traditional folkloric and belly dancing shows
title: Day Trip to Old Cairo and 3-Hour Dinner Cruise

description: Explore the best of Cairo s monuments on a full-day coach tour from Hurghada, and see the Giza Plateau and Egyptian Museum, home to more than 120,000 relics of Egyptian history. , ,A tour representative will pick you up at 02:30 from your Hurghada hotel for the coach transfer to Cairo. Upon arrival, your Egyptologist guide will take you to the stunning Pyramids of Giza in the Giza Plateau. The oldest of the 7 Wonders of the Ancient World, the pyramids of Cheops, Khafre and Mykerinos form the major highlight of the Giza Necropolis. , ,Tour the massive mortuary tombs of the Pharaohs, and the Great Sphinx statue, constructed in the shape of a lion s body with a human head. Explore the Valley Temple before a light lunch at a local restaurant. , ,Continue into central Cairo to wander the galleries of the remarkable Egyptian Museum, home to an astonishing collection of relics from the pre-dynastic era to the Pharaonic era and the Greco-Roman period. A highlight of its treasures are the artifacts of the child King Tutankhamen, but look too at the displays of other Pharaonic Gods and Goddess, and visit the mummies room to learn about mummification art in ancient Egypt. , Finally, visit the Khan El Khalili Market, the oldest market in the Middle East, and search for unique souvenir gifts, before the drive back to Hurghada.
includes: Hotel pick-up and drop-off ,Transportation by air-conditioned bus ,Egyptologist guide ,Entrance fees ,Tax and service charge ,Lunch
experiences: See the best of Cairo's monuments in one day ,Visit the Great Pyramids of Giza and see the pyramids of Cheops, Khafre and Mykerinos ,Explore the massive mortuary tombs and the statue of the Great Sphinx ,Go to the Valley Temple ,Tour the Egyptian Museum, home to more than 120,000 relics of Ancient Egypt ,Marvel at the treasures of the child King Tutankhamen ,Wander the narrow streets of the Khan El Khalili Market, the oldest bazaar in the Middle East
title: Giza Pyramids & Egyptian Museum from Hurghada by Bus

description: You ll be picked up at your hotel and transferred by air-conditioned bus to the beach buggy station. Begin your 3-hour tour with a 25-kilometer buggy drive to the Bedouin village. , ,When you arrive, you ll meet friendly locals and have a chance to sit and talk with them. Learn about their inspiring culture and way of life while enjoying the taste of Bedouin tea. , ,You ll ride a camel around the village to see more of the area. Return to your beach buggy and drive it back to the beach buggy station. , From there you ll be transferred back to your hotel by bus.
includes: Hotel pick-up and drop off ,Transportation by air-conditioned bus ,Professional English-speaking tour guide ,Soft drinks and bottled water at the Bedouin camp ,Quad bike ,Camel ride ,Tea and water pipe at the Bedouin camp ,Service charges and taxes
experiences: Drive a beach buggy through the Hurghada desert ,Meet friendly Bedouins in their tents ,Ride a camel and explore the Bedouin village
title: Hurghada: 3-Hour Morning Quad Safari

description: Following an early morning pick-up from your hotel in Hurghada, transfer to a tour boat for the start of your dive adventure in the Red Sea. , ,Go to the first dive spot and prepare to discover the incredible underwater ecosystems. You don't need to know how to dive to take part; a dive master or instructor will be there to help you for the entire tour. All you need do is breathe and take in the magnificent surroundings! , ,Dive in the pristine waters of the Red Sea to see its remarkable flora and fauna. If you decide not to go underwater, enjoy some casual snorkeling or sunbathe on the white sand beaches. After the first dive spot, head to another reef for a second dive. , ,Lunch will be served at approximately 14:00 and you will return to your hotel at around 16:30.
includes: Hotel pick-up and drop off ($10 surcharge per person for hotels in Makkadi, Sahl Hasheesh or El Gouna) ,Diving equipment ,Dive master or instructor ,Lunch on board ,Transportation by air-conditioned vehicle ,2 dive sites ,Scuba tanks ,Sinker ,Water and soft drinks ,All taxes and service charges
experiences: Discover the magnificent flora and fauna of the Red Sea's underwater ecosystem ,Get dive tips and advice from a dive master who will be nearby at all times ,Enjoy a complimentary lunch
title: Hurghada: Full-Day Scuba Diving Adventure Tour with Lunch

description: Alexandria has so much to see, feel, eat and buy   fit in as much of it as possible on this day tour from Cairo. Start your day trip to Alexandria with pick-up from your accommodation in a comfortable vehicle. The first stop on this full-day tour will be a visit to the Library of Alexandria, the biggest library in the world. Now housing 8 million books, you can visit its open court to see the statues of Alexander the Great and Ptolemy the First keeping watch over the library.  ,  ,The car will then whisk you off to the Church of St. Mark, the oldest church in Africa. Then, continue on to the old downtown of Alexandria where you can walk through traditional markets where everything and anything is sold. Admire the downtown s Baroque designs and Italian- and French-style properties. If you choose, have lunch in a famous restaurant called  Mohamed Ahmed s    the Queen of Spain has eaten here! Take a break in a coffee shop or shisha caf e before continuing on with your tour. ,  ,Continue your Alexandria adventure in the afternoon with a packed itinerary of sights. See the city s oldest market area which contains both the women s markets and the most spectacular gold market where everyone buys their wedding jewelry. See the prettiest and largest mosque in the city, the Abbo Elabbas Mosque, and the ancient fun-fair located just outside of it where children still play. Opposite is the corniche and old harbour where you can see fishing boats and traditional fishers making nets. From here, walk 5 minutes to see the Quaitbay castle. See Memorial of the Unknown Soldier, and the beautiful coastline on the way to the Montaza Palace and Gardens (also known as the Love Garden for its popularity with couples!). All of these will make for excellent photo opportunities, so don't forget your camera. Finally, cross over the modern Bridge of Stanley before travelling in comfort back to your hotel.
includes: All transfers by air-conditioned vehicle ,Expert tour guide ,Entrance fees ,All service charges and taxes
experiences: See the library of Alexandria and the statues of Alexander and Ptolemy keeping watch outside ,Wander around the markets in the old city center where you're sure to find a treasure or two ,Explore the Montaza Gardens surrounding the palace ,Admire the Abbo Elabbas Mosque, the most beautiful mosque in the city ,Stop for unique photo opportunities
title: From Cairo: Alexandria Day Tour

description: You will find an air-conditioned bus waiting for you at your hotel at the arranged pick-up time. Heading for the Egyptian museum and your courier will be holding a sign with your name. Refresh yourself by cool drinks served to you during the drive. , ,The first step of the day tour is to the home of the monuments to the Pharaohs  history. This museum  hosts more than 120,000 rare artifacts from the Three Kingdoms, At least half of which are on display. You have two  full  floors with 107 halls to view. While the ground floor holds heavy statutes,  the second floor contains the small statues, papyrus, the mummies and the world s most extensive collection of the boy King of Tut-Ench-Amun. Take your time discovering his shining items, but pull yourself from the bewitching room and put in mind, the most astonishing has not been shown yet.
includes: All transfers in an air-conditioned vehicle ,Port pick-up & drop off ,Private tour guide ,Soft drinks during the drive ,Entrance fees to all the attractions mentioned in the itinerary
experiences: See the Tahrir Square, where the Egyptian revolution broke out ,Explore the Egyptian Museum ,Marvel at Tutankhamun's exclusive section in the museum
title: Cairo: Tahrir Square Tour & Egyptian Museum

description: Begin the trip by setting sail at around 9:00 AM where the astonishing clarity of the water will reveal a mesmerizing underwater world full of colors you don t see above the Red Sea. , ,Upon arrival at the marina, your guide will provide you with all the equipment you need, before explaining how to use it, as well as how to ensure that you will be warm and comfortable during your snorkeling tour. , ,Later, your boat will sail for around 1 hour to the first snorkeling spot, where you will have chance to see dolphins. Then, it will take you to the other area for snorkeling with around 30 minutes of sailing between each one. , ,After the second snorkeling area, you will be offered lunch on the boat with 1 soft drink. , ,The trip will finish around 4:00 PM when you will be taken back to the marina.
includes: Hotel Transfer round trip ,Local car/taxi ,All equipment (mask, tube, fins, life vest if needed) ,Snorkeling guide ,Lunch on the boat with 1 soft drink
experiences: Experience the fun of snorkeling ,Watch dolphins in their natural habitat ,Enjoy this relaxing trip with lunch and a soft drink
title: Dolphin Red Sea Clear Water Snorkeling

description: Climb aboard and set sail across the Red Sea from Sharm El Sheikh to the sanctuary of Tiran Island. Upon arrival, discover an underwater paradise for snorkeling and avail of the services of experienced instructors. Benefit from tips for beginners and explanations about the local marine life. , ,Take 1 or 2 dives to experience the underwater landscapes and encounter a variety of different fish and other sea life. Avail of soft drinks throughout the day, along with lunch served on board the boat in the afternoon. Find perfect spots to relax on the white sandy beaches.

description: Combine your vacation in Egypt with a day trip to Cairo. You will be picked up at your hotel and driven to the airport. Your tour guide will be waiting for you in Cairo and will take you to visit the Egyptian Museum. There you can admire the magnificent treasures of the young pharaoh Tutankhamun and the impressive ancient riches of human culture. , ,Afterwards you can enjoy traditional Egyptian cuisine at a local restaurant before heading on to the oldest surviving wonder of the world   the Great Pyramid of Giza. You will also see the Pyramid of Khafre and the Pyramid of Menkaure, and can enjoy the breathtaking view over all the pyramids of the former kings and queens from the plateau. You will then drive to the guardians of all pyramids   the Great Sphinx of Giza. , ,At the end of the day you will be driven to the airport in Cairo, where you will catch the flight back to Hurghada. You will be met at the airport in Hurghada and transferred back to your hotel.
includes: All transfers by air-conditioned vehicle ,Domestic flights (Hurghada   Cairo   Hurghada) ,Private tour guide ,Soft drinks and water during the drive ,Entrance fees to all sights on the itinerary ,Lunch at a selected restaurant
experiences: Discover the fascinating world of the pyramids and visit the Great Pyramid and the Pyramid of Khafre in Giza ,Admire the treasures of the pharaohs in the Egyptian Museum as well as the largest collection of Egyptian relics ,See the largest and most famous Sphinx in the world   one of the most important landmarks of Egypt
title: From Hurghada: Cairo Full-Day Tour including Flights

description: On day one, you will be picked up from your hotel and begin the journey to Alexandria. Once there, visit the insides of the Catacombs of Kom El Shokafa which are the largest Roman Cemetery consisting of three levels cut in the rock.  , ,Then, drive to visit the Roman Amphitheater of Alexandria with the display of the sunken monuments of Alexandria which were discovered under the East harbor of Alexandria. You will also drive by Pompay s Pillar and stop for a photo stop.  , ,After that, visit the Citadel of Quaitbay from inside and take outstanding photos inside and outside of it before heading to the library of Alexandria. Visit it s open court where you can see the statue of Alexander the Great and the statue of Ptolemy the first. There, visit the library's reading halls, president Saddat Museum, and the impressions of Alexandria Museum. , ,The car will then take you to visit the church of St. Mark, the oldest church in Africa, and El Nabi Daniel Mosque before taking you back to your hotel to stay overnight in Alexandria.  , ,On day two, be picked up from your hotel by your tour guide after breakfast. Then, travel to the biggest mosque in the city, the Abbo Elabbas Mosque before continuing to see the outside of Quaitbay castle which was built on the same site as the ancient Lighthouse of Alexandria, one of the seven wonders of the world.  , ,Next, head to the gardens of Montaza where you can visit the royal gardens of King Farouk and see the royal palaces of Haramlek and Salamlek as well as walk along the famous Montaza bridge. , ,On your way back, stop over the famous bridge of Stanley, the landmark of modern Alexandria before returning to Cairo with an A/C car.
includes: 1 night hotel accommodation in Alexandria on Bed & Breakfast basis ,Entrance fees to all mentioned sites ,All transfers by air-conditioned vehicle ,Expert tour guide ,All service charges & taxes
experiences: See the catacombs of Kom El Shokafa ,Stop for a photo at Pompay's Pillar ,Walk through the Library of Alexandria Manuscripts museum ,Discover the Castle of Kaitbey ,Visit the Montaza Gardens and the Palaces
title: From Cairo: Overnight Trip to Alexandria

description: Discover the beauty of Cairo in one day. Enjoy an incredible view along the coast of the Red Sea during your arrival by bus. , ,Once in the city, visit the Egyptian Museum with the incredible treasures of the boy king Tutankhamen and countless artifacts of Egyptian history. Then see the Pyramids of Giza (Cheops, Khafra and Menkaure). Learn more about the fascinating construction of the pyramids and see the world-famous Sphinx. , ,During the tour, enjoy a delicious lunch at a restaurant near the pyramids and return to your hotel in Makadi Bay at the end of the day.
includes: All transfers with the bus ,German-speaking tour guide ,Soft drinks during the drive ,All entry fees to aforementioned attractions ,Lunch in a restaurant
experiences: Spend an exciting day in Cairo on a bus tour and immerse yourself in the history of ancient Egyptian pharaohs ,See the Egyptian Museum's countless exhibitions and the treasures of Tutankhamen ,Visit the Pyramids of Giza with Cheops, Khafra and Menkaure, and see the Sphinx
title: From Makadi Bay: Day Trip to Cairo by Bus

description: Benefit from pick-up at your hotel in Sharm El Sheikh, and then journey to a Quad Bike center not from the resort, but far from the crowds and traffic in an isolated desert location. , ,Meet your instructor and get a safety briefing and some tips on how to get the best out of what lies ahead. Benefit from the expertize of your instructors as they escort you through the desert for about 2 hours. Make your way to a Bedouin tent, where you will be welcomed with a complimentary drink. , ,Get some time to freshen up while the Quad Bike engines cool down. Purchase extra drinks if you still need hydrating before setting off again. Experience the drama of Echo Mountain, where the fun really kicks in! Scout around the mountain landscape and take stunning souvenir photos. , Follow your instructors to secret passages deep in the desert for the most thrilling Quad Bike ride. At the end of your adventure, sit back and relax on the journey back to your hotel.
includes: Hotel pick-up and drop off ,Transportation by air-conditioned vehicle ,Tea in a Bedouin tent
experiences: Cross the dunes of the Sinai Desert by Quad Bike ,Stop at a Bedouin tent and try some local Bedouin tea ,Experience a Sinai Desert sunset from a unique perspective
title: Sharm : Quad Bike Safari Adventure with Transfers

description: Enjoy an unforgettable stay in Hurghada unforgettable and witness an extraordinary 1-hour dolphin show at the beautiful Dolphin House. , ,Get picked up directly at your hotel in Hurghada in the afternoon and enjoy a convenient 20-minute drive to the Dolphin House in a comfortable, air-conditioned vehicle. Once you arrive, get ready for an incredible 1-hour dolphin show with 3 incredibly smart and playful dolphins. , ,Get up close and personal to the dolphins, and witness the intelligence and charm of these special animals with your whole family, while taking as many photos as you can of this unforgettable show. , ,After the 1-hour spectacle, enjoy a transfer directly back to your hotel in Hurghada.
includes: Entrance to the Dolphin show ,Pick-up and drop off at your hotel ,Transfer in comfortable, air-conditioned vehicle ,All service charges
experiences: Get up close and personal with dolphins ,Witness their amazing intelligence and charm for yourself ,Enjoy an admirable show with a dolphin and a friendly sea lion
title: Hurghada Dolphin Show Tickets and Transfer

description: Benefit from hotel pick-up in Marsa Alam, and then journey by 4WD jeep towards the El Fayrouze Hotel, 5 kilometers from Port Ghalib. Continue to a Bedouin village to experience the traditional life of the desert. , ,Stop to take photos of the famous acacia trees and get a window into life in the wilderness. Take a tour of the village and stimulate your senses by going on a camel ride across the sands. Get the option to explore by Quad Bike on request to experience the landscape from a different perspective. , ,Visit a Bedouin pharmacy and enjoy some Bedouin tea before climbing a 400-meter mountain to watch the sunset. Relax under a canopy of stars and enjoy dinner as you watch traditional folk shows, such as belly dancing and the whirling dance of the tanoura show.
includes: Hotel pick-up and drop off ,Transportation by modern vehicle ,Visit to a Bedouin village ,Camel ride ,1 soft drink ,Desert safari guide ,Dinner
experiences: Climb a mountain to watch the sunset over the desert ,Visit a Bedouin village to learn more about traditional life near Port Ghalib ,Watch folk shows and belly dancing under a canopy of stars
title: From Marsa Alam: All-in-One Super Desert Safari

description: After pick-up from your hotel in Cairo, take a felucca ride on the Nile. Enjoy refreshing breezes with a ride on a traditional Egyptian sailboat. Along the way, learn interesting facts about the history of Cairo. , ,Enjoy an incredible outing with friends or family away from the stress of the big city and see a spectacular view of Cairo from the water. Sit back, relax, and watch the sun set.
includes: Pick-up and drop-off from and to your hotel in an air-conditioned vehicle ,2-hour felucca rental ,Multilingual tour guide ,1 soft drink on board
experiences: Enjoy a ride on the Nile in a traditional Egyptian sailboat and relax away from big city stresses ,Admire the highlights of Cairo from the water and learn about the history of Egypt ,Experience the incredible colors of sunrise or sunset from the water

description: You will be picked up from your hotel in Marsa Alam in the afternoon and drive to Sheikh Malek, 25 kilometers north of Marsa Alam airport. Once you feel comfortable on the quad bike, ride through the desert for approximately 22 kilometers between the mountains of the Eastern desert to a Bedouin village to visit a local tribe. , ,At the Bedouin village, you'll be welcomed with tea and learn more about the life and traditions. See how traditional bread is baked, see the water well, and try smoking a water pipe. Then you'll take a camel ride to witness the amazing views of the sunset. Afterwards, have a barbeque dinner in the heart of the mountains. , ,Enjoy watching a Bedouin show and you savour a delicious barbeque open buffet dinner. The show includes the performance of folk songs, and belly dancing. At the end of the evening, you will drive your quad bike back to the station, then transfer back to your hotel in Marsa Alam.
includes: Hotel pickup and drop off in Marsa Alam ,Quad bike test drive before the journey ,Professional guide ,Camel ride ,Bedouin village tour with tea ,Barbeque dinner with mineral water and soft drinks ,All service charge and taxes
experiences: Ride a quad bike in the Egyptian desert near Marsa Alam ,Visit a Bedouin village to learn about local traditions and culture ,Enjoy a delicious buffet dinner and a Bedouin show
title: Marsa Alam: Sunset Desert Safari Excursion By Quad Bike

description: Avoid the torment and stress of waiting for taxis by opting for this affordable airport transfer. Your skilled driver will be waiting for you at the airport with a name sign in the arrivals hall. From here they will help with your luggage before guiding you to your premium airport transfer. , For hotel pick-up, your driver will meet you at your hotel lobby. Please be ready and waiting 10 minutes before your designated meeting time. It is recommended to give your flight number in advance, so your driver can arrive at the appropriate time. If there happens to be a delay in your flight, your driver will be waiting until you arrive safely at no extra fee. , ,All drivers have excellent experience and a wealth of knowledge of the city. If you have any questions at any stage of your transfer, simply ask. Whether you d prefer music, talking or simply snoozing after a long journey, your driver will get you safely to the right destination.
includes: Professional chauffeur ,Airport or hotel pick-up ,Private transfer ,Transport by air-conditioned vehicle ,Local taxes ,Airport taxes ,All taxes, fees and handling charges ,Gratuities
experiences: Be driven by a professional chauffeur ,Choose between airport or hotel pick-up ,Enjoy a private transfer ,Relish in the transport of an air-conditioned vehicle
title: Sharm El Sheikh: Private Airport Transfer with London Cab

description: Immerse yourself in the world of Arabic myths and legends, and enjoy an evening of One Thousand and One Nights. You will be picked at your hotel in Hurghada and driven to the magnificent hotel Alf Leila Wa Leila. , ,At the hotel you can enjoy a delicious dinner with traditional delicacies. Following this, you can enjoy a fantastic show that will not only impress you with exotic music and stunning light effects but also take you back to the time of the pharaohs. Admire the replica exhibits and marvel at the famous monuments of bygone times. Be enchanted by a fascinating belly dance and a pharaonic horse show.
includes: Transfers from/to your hotel by air-conditioned vehicle ,Traditional dinner
experiences: Experience the special oriental atmosphere of Alf Leila Wa Leila hotel ,Admire a breathtaking show with traditional music and stunning light effects ,Enjoy a delicious dinner with traditional delicacies

description: Discover the gorgeous bay of Sharm El Naga. Located just 40 kilometers from Hurghada, this bay offers the perfect balance for all visitors seeking peace and quiet. After the pick-up at your hotel, the guide will drive you to the bay in an air-conditioned vehicle, where you will start the day of pure relaxation. , ,Upon arrival you can explore the unique nature reserve. This quiet bay is a great location for you to relax on your vacation. Sharm El Naga is famous for its beautiful coral reefs and crystal-clear water. Relax on the fantastic sandy beach and enjoy swimming and snorkeling in the protected reef. Discover the magnificent underwater world and explore a little paradise. , ,Enjoy a delicious lunch at a local restaurant before returning to Hurghada by bus in the afternoon, where you will be dropped off at your hotel.
includes: All transfers by air-conditioned vehicle ,Snorkeling equipment ,Entrance fees ,Lifejackets ,Toilets Fresh-water showers ,Lunch at a restaurant ,Sun umbrellas
experiences: Admire the gorgeous bay of Sharm El Naga and enjoy a relaxing and peaceful day ,Discover the beautiful coral reefs and enjoy snorkeling in the bay among the stunning marine life ,Enjoy the fantastic sandy beach, relax in the sunshine, and be enchanted by a touch of paradise
title: From Hurghada: Sharm El Naga Full-Day Snorkeling Tour

description: Discover the beauty and secrets of the Red Sea on a day-long boat cruise. Explore 3 select snorkeling sites where you will have the opportunity to explore the colourful underwater world and coral reefs. Keep your eyes peeled for rays, sea turtles, angelfish, and playful dolphins in their natural habitat.  , ,Enjoy a sumptuous lunch buffet served onboard with salads and grilled dishes prepared in the traditional way.
includes: Lunch buffet with different BBQ meats and salads ,2 kinds of local fruits ,Soft and hot drinks ,Snacks
experiences: Swim and snorkel in selected coral reef spots ,Explore the crystal clear waters of the Red Sea ,Relax on board on the special sun deck ,Enjoy a delicious traditional lunch buffet served on board

7-Hour Desert Safari from Sharm el-Sheikh

description: See the Pyramids  7 magical vantage points which are unique for taking pictures. Hear about all the hidden stories of these great Pyramids. See special panoramic views of the Pyramids as you learn about the history of Ancient Egypt. , ,The tour includes many outstanding photo stops and a visit to the Valley Temple which belongs to the Pyramids of Chephren. This temple served for the purification and mummification process of the king before his burial.
includes: Flexibility to customize the itinerary to your own preferences ,All transfers by modern air-conditioned van ,Pick-up and drop-off to/from your hotel ,Tour guide ,Entrance fees ,All service charges and taxes

description: Early in the morning, around 2:30, you will be picked up from your hotel in El Gouna or its vicinity, to travel in an air-conditioned minibus or car, to Cairo. The journey lasts around 5 hours. , ,At the half-way point you will stop for a rest and a break at a service station. The day will be long, and full of excitement, so we recommend you sleep through this part of the journey, taking you through the desert, where there isn't so much to see. , ,When you arrive in Cairo your guide will be waiting for you by the Egyptian Museum. He will accompany you the whole day. , ,The first thing you will see is the Egyptian Museum. Your guide will take you through the vast museum, showing you the masterworks of the collection, and explaining them expertly. By the time you're finished it will be midday, and time for lunch. , ,After lunch you will go to see the pyramids of Giza. You can examine each of the pyramids from outside at your pleasure, and with a little luck (there is a limited number of guests allowed inside each day) enter the chambers inside, for an extra fee. After this exploration of history, you will have a chance to see Egyptian life as it is today, in the Khan-el-Khalili bazaar. It is the largest bazaar in the whole of the Middle East, and still retains its characteristic ancient flavor. , ,The return journey to Hurghada/El Gouna is at around 17:00. , ,Come along on this exclusive tour, and immerse yourself in the past!
includes: Travel from and to your hotel in a comfortable private vehicle ,Soft drinks during the journey ,Guide ,Entry to the Egyptian Museum ,Lunch
experiences: Visit the Egyptian Museum and see masterpieces of art and artifacts from Dynastic Egypt ,See the Pyramids of Giza ,Experience daily life in Egypt at the Khan-el-Khalili bazaar
title: Cairo Day Trip with Egyptian Museum Tickets: From El Gouna
Cairo: Best Kept Secrets Tour
Aswan to Luxor: 3-Day Guided Tour with Transfers

description: Enjoy the variety of Egypt and visit Cairo from Hurghada. , ,An air-conditioned car will bring you from your hotel to Hurghada airport where you will board your flight to Cairo. On arrival in the Egyptian capital, an Egyptologist guide will be waiting for your arrival. , ,The journey begins in Giza, where you will visit 3 of Egypt's largest and most famous pyramids. The Great Pyramid is the oldest, and is the last remaining Wonder of the 7 Wonders of the World. The tip of the Pyramid of Khafre is still partially covered with limestone. The Pyramid of Menkaure is surrounded by 3 other, much smaller pyramids. , ,Visit the step pyramids of Sakkara. The necropolis of Sakkara is the next most important burial site of Lower Egypt, after Giza. The largest and most impressive burial site is that of the Pharaoh Djoser, from the 3rd dynasty of the Old Kingdom, around 2650 B.C. He is buried in a famous step pyramid. , ,You will also visit Memphis, the old capital city, where you will see ruins and the giant toppled statue of the Pharaoh Ramses II, as well as the Alabaster Sphinx. , ,In the afternoon you can visit Khan el-Khalili bazaar to go shopping. You'll also get to visit the famous antiques market in Cairo. , ,After an unforgettable day, you will be brought back to the airport in Cairo in the evening. Fly back to Hurghada where you will be transferred back to your hotel having enjoying a great day in the Egyptian capital.
includes: All transfers in an air-conditioned vehicle ,Internal flights (Hurghada/Cairo/Hurghada) ,Private guide ,Soft drinks during transfers ,Entry to the attractions mentioned in the program ,Lunch
experiences: Fly from Hurghada to Cairo on a full-day tour ,Marvel at the pyramids of Giza ,See the Sphinx ,Enjoy lunch in Cairo ,Wander through Khan el-Khalili bazaar ,Visit the step pyramids of Sakkara and Memphis
title: Hurghada: Day Trip to Pyramids, Memphis & Sakkara by Flight

description: Discover the unique island of Mahmya in the Red Sea, part of the protected Giftun Island National Park just off the coast from Hurghada. The full-day tour includes round-trip transfers by air-conditioned vehicle direct from your hotel, and a 1-hour sailing tour. , Following your transfer, start by sailing the turquoise waters on board a comfortable boat. Marvel at views of the white sand beaches and palm thatched beach huts. Soak up the Red Sea sun, watching for playful dolphins as you go. Then, upon arrival at Mahmya, you are free to snorkel the impressive coral heads of the clear lagoon. Relax on the beach and swim in crystal clear waters. , ,A lunch of Italian and seafood specialties will be served at the island restaurant, and drinks are available from the bar throughout the day. , ,Maintained under strict conservation guidelines, Mahmya is the perfect getaway from the urban sprawl of Hurghada, offering peace and privacy for all ages. Glass bottomed boats are available to rent, allowing you the chance to look at the underwater world without getting (too) wet! , ,Sail back to the marina for a transfer to your hotel at the end of the day.
includes: Pick-up and drop off from hotels in Hurghada ,Transportation by air-conditioned vehicle ,All taxes and service charges ,Guide ,Entrance fee and submarine ticket
experiences: Explore the underwater world of the Red Sea ,Sail to the protected island of Mahmya ,Look for the playful dolphins of Giftun Island National Park ,Enjoy a lunch of seafood and Italian specialties ,Relax on white sand beaches and swim in crystal clear sea
title: Mahmya Island Full-Day Snorkel Tour from Hurghada

description: Start your adventure with a pick-up from your hotel in Aswan or Aswan airport, bus or train station. Transfer to your cruise ship to check in and freshen up. Visit the High Dam and Philae Temple.  , ,In the morning the cruise will start sailing towards Kom Ombo, where you will visit the largest temple in Egypt. Continue to sail towards Edfu where the biggest temple of the god Horus located. Arrive in Luxor in the late afternoon and visit the East Bank of the Nile, take in the Temple of Karnak, the Temple of Luxor, and the Obelisk of Ramses II.  , ,On the final day, cross to the West Bank to the Valley of the Kings. See the Temple of Queen Hatshepsut at Deir el-Bahari. See the Colossi of Memnon and visit an alabaster institute. At the end of the tour, you will be transferred back to your hotel in Luxor, the airport, train, or bus station.
includes: Meet and assist service (arrival and departure) from hotel, airport, train or bus station ,Guided Day Tour to Aswan sightseeing ,Guided Tour to the East and West Banks of Luxor ,Guided Tour to Kom Ombo and Edfu temples ,All transfers by modern air-conditioned vehicle ,3 Nights Accommodation on a 5-star cruise ship (full-board basis excluding drinks) ,Expert tour guide (choose your own Language ) ,All service charges and taxes
experiences: Enjoy a 5-star luxury Nile River cruise ,See the Philae Temple and the High Dam in Aswan ,Explore the Valley of the Kings in Luxor ,Marvel at the Temple of Horus in Edfu ,Visit the Temple of Karnak, the oldest religious structure in the world
title: Aswan 4-Day Nile Cruise to Luxor

description: Enjoy a full-day snorkel trip by boat to the best spots of Ras Mohamed or Tiran Strait. The trip is suitable for the whole family. You will discover many beautiful corals, which seem like underwater gardens. Besides that, you will meet plenty of colorful fishes, which are typical for the Red Sea. Your snorkel guide will gladly show you the best snorkeling places. , ,Transfer from your hotel to the jetty, where you will board a comfortable and specious boat, equipped with sun decks, perfect for relaxing or sunbathing the whole day. You will make 2 to 3 stops for snorkeling. , ,In the meantime, soft drinks and lunch will be served. The meeting time in the morning will be given after reconfirmation. You just need to bring your swimsuit, towel, suncream and good mood.
includes: Mask, fins, life jacket, wetsuit (in wintertime only) ,Lunch, soft drinks, water, tea and coffee
experiences: Discover the underwater life and amazing corals of the Red Sea while snorkeling ,Let your snorkel guide show you all the colorful fishes and corals ,Have lunch and soft drinks served on-board
title: Sharm el-Sheikh Day Tiran Island or Ras Mohamed Park Snorkel

description: Experience the unending expanse of the Hurghada Desert, admire one of the usual Fata Morgana mirages, and see the countless sand dunes in the middle of the desert. , ,After the tour through the desert, arrive at a traditional Bedouin camp. After a bit of relaxation, enjoy the opportunity to explore the camp and learn more about the life and culture of these desert denizens. , ,Watch the sunset and enjoy a dinner buffet. Try Middle Eastern specialties and see an incredible performance with belly dancing, Arabian music and a snake show. , ,Admire the night sky and see the planets and stars with a digital telescope before returning to your hotel.
includes: Desert safari in a Jeep ,Water and soft drinks in the van ,Dinner with the Bedouins ,Camel ride ,Telescope view of the night sky ,Entry fees for aforementioned attractions
experiences: Experience a Jeep safari through the Hurghada Desert and see countless sand dunes ,Visit a Bedouin camp and learn more about the life and culture of these desert denizens ,Enjoy characteristic Arabian delicacies and see a show with belly dancing, folk music and snake charming
